website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality bag that's great for dedicated, daily use.
cons: If bag doesn't seem responsive enough, try inflating to around 8 psi

customer_reviews.title: High quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag. As a beginner, I didn't want to have a poor quality bag be an excuse for developing bad habits or getting poor feedback. I feel the small is the perfect size for someone who will progress quickly and is realistic with their abilities. Just after three sessions I have this bad boy drumming really solid. Being smaller, it also doesn't cause a ton of noise or vibration on my cheaper Everlast station. It works together perfect. It's a great bag, I'll likely be getting additional sizes. Also great to have it be soft enough to use it without hand protection.
customer_reviews.author: CorvusTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A SWEET BAG
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE THIS BAG I USE IT THREE OR FOUR TIMES A WEEK MY HANDS ARE NOT THE TOUGHEST ON THE PLANET BUT WITH THIS BAG I DON'T NEED GLOVES OR WRAPS . THE LEATHER IS SMOOTH THE SEAMS DON'T RAISE BAG SEEMS TO REMAIN INFLATED QUITE AWHILE [I'VE HAD IT ABOUT TWO MONTHS AND I'VE REINFLATED IN ONCE] . I REALLY ENJOY MY TIME SPENT WITH THIS BAG . I PURCHASED A BOOK ON USING THE SPEED BAG WITH WAS HELPFUL . ONE OF THE POINTS MENTIONED IN THE BOOK WAS THAT YOU LEARN SKILLS OVER NIGHT. WHICH I FOUND TO BE TRUE JUST PLAY OFTEN AND YOU WILL IMPROVE ITS REALLY COOL
customer_reviews.author: waswasho

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We received a defective bag. We attempted to resolve the issue but received the run around as policy was more important than customer satisfaction or ensuring quality products. This bag was not up to par with the hype of quality as expected. So disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jai Ram

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's that good.
customer_reviews.text: There are many good reviews about the Reyes speed bag. The moment I unwrapped mine I instantly knew all the reviews were spot on. The genuine leather and workmanship make this a well balanced and beautiful looking speed bag. But more importantly, it moves on the speed bag platform with the speed and responsivness of any professional speed bag you would find at the best boxing gyms. There is no need to be redundant in this review. The many positive reviews say it all and YES, the bag is really that good.
customer_reviews.author: captainron

customer_reviews.title: I like this speedbag.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased x-small Cleto Reyes, but I returned it. It was too light for me. I then got the small Cleto Reyes, and I like it. I also have Small Balazs. But I prefer the Cleto over Balazs because Cleto is lighter and faster.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.S

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best bags available. The leather is so soft it feels like fine gloves. My bag is well balanced and symmetrical, so it works fine. Heavy steel rivets hold the strap. Don't know how they can make it any better. This is the most common size, and the size I would recommend. I have a large bag and a small bag but the medium is the one I use the most. My wife likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag of Bags
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fast. Great bounce. Works very well paired with the Everlast professional swivel. It also came with a replacement bladder. Easily worth the money. I had 1 small issue, the picture showed a black bag with blue stitching which I thought looked awesome, but received one with red stitching, purely cosmetic difference. The bag itself and its performance is still worth the money and gets 5 stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: kurtis

customer_reviews.title: did not brake in 10 min
customer_reviews.text: bought a titan punching bag stand the speed bag included broke in less then 10 minuts so i replaced it with this speed bag and so far has held up very well. i gave this item a 4 out of 5 only because i only had it installed for a short time will change to a 5 depending on how long it lasts but out the gate i give it a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: infamous_fat_drunk

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but Slower
customer_reviews.text: Quality of skin and bladder are very good. Although the bag itself is small, which is what I wanted, the bag is long and narrow, as is the loop. As a result, the distance the bag travels from punch to platform is greater, resulting in slower than expected return. I see they have an XS size but at this price, I'd be more comfortable seeing it first. Hopefully, I can beat it into shape. :)
customer_reviews.author: John Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love a Cleto bag
customer_reviews.text: Cleto bags are in my opinion the best. From bible bagging to boxing style training they're great. Fast, sound great, and they even smell like you've walked into a fine leather shop. The only con I can speak on is that they, (Cleto Reyes speed bags) don't hold their air well. I have six cleto's and I have to pump them weekly. Titles, ringsides and everlasts hold their air much longer. That said; I have no problem taking a few seconds to pump them up nice and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Coup De Grace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you hit the speed bag everyday, this the bag for you. This is by far the best speed bag I've hit. You can definitely feel the quality right out the box. Feels really great on your hands with no lose stitching. Big plus is that this comes with an extra bladder replacement, so definitely something that is going to last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Best speed bag I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've been through countless cheaper models of speedboats and they never last more than a month or so. I've had this one for nearly a year and it's still going strong. The price is a little high but if you consistantly use a speed bag, it's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great speed bag !
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It is fast with predictable rebounds. The leather is easy on the hands and it seems to be well balanced. The quality is obvious. Thick strap, welted seams and riveted strap. Pay the extra and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BaggericTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: After going through three other speed bags - all of them with a blown inner bladder - I decided to spend a little more money and purchase this Cleto Reyes. I couldn't be happier. The bag not only looks great but is perfectly balanced and stay in rhythm without that clunky sound. Highly recommend this bag. Spend the money. It's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and it’s not made in “ China “!
customer_reviews.text: I received the speed bag in a very timely manner and I was very happy with it. The only thing is that the bladder has to have air pumped into it every three to four days. Other than that, I love it! Top of the line product!
customer_reviews.author: Alan e little

customer_reviews.title: Greatest speed bag I've ever seen or used!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I'm more impressed by, the build quality, the fact that they give you a spare bladder, the responsiveness of the bag or the smell of fine leather. After I ordered this I was kind of upset with myself for spending so much on a speed bag. Once it arrived I bought another in a different size so I could have two. They are that good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Cherry

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've edited my review. The leatherwork is flawless on this bag. Nice quality leather and stitching. I, and another reviewer, complained about the lack of bounce on this bag. Not true. Ive seen it recommended 10psi, and keep mine inflated at 8psi and it's perfect. I inflated it at standard 4psi and it wasn't enough.
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: Best Speed Bag on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy a cheap knock off. This bag is amazing and the second you begin using it you will be happy you spent the extra 30 bucks. The action is seamless and it balances very well. Go with the largest option.
customer_reviews.author: AndyB

customer_reviews.title: This bag seems to be very good quality...
customer_reviews.text: I've had my bag for several months now, I've popped 6 China made Title speed bag and yes even though Title is based in the midwest all of their bags are garbage made in China with 0 quality control. My only complaint about the Cleto bag is I would like to see them make a smaller bag and inch each way would be awesome. I haven't seen any wear on the leather even though I hit it in the same spot almost every time which is nice, I hope I get many more months out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Poor poor service
customer_reviews.text: 80 plus dollar bag dosent hold air,complained weeks ago, never heard a word back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product !
customer_reviews.text: Works good, I can tell a difference between a $30 bag and a $ 70 bag you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Big K-B

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid speed bad, nice bounce Great quality materials, altiough mine is a little deformed, see pic. Update. Bladder leaks air and needed to be reinflated every 2 days or so. Updated from 3 to 4 stars since the minor deformity does not really affect the performance that much, minus one star for minor leak.
customer_reviews.author: aaa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't lose air.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! XXS size is fast, improves speed and coordination. It doesn't lose air as some reviewers claim and it does come with two bladders. Can't go wrong with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wynieski

customer_reviews.title: I like this bag
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag. It is a lot faster than the one that it replaced (it was new too). It rebounds very straight and holds air long enough to get in a good session.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rosson

customer_reviews.title: Great Speedbag so far
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag in comparison to the crappy Everlast bag that wouldn't hold air for any length of time. I've tried it once since I bought it and it felt really nice so I look forward to enjoying it more often. I also got the Everlast professional swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Afya_Abrafi

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautifully made product
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully made product. The stitching is top quality as is the leather itself. It comes with a rubber bladder but can be used as is, without it. My husband loves this and says it is nicer than the ones at his boxing gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality speed bag
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the good quality of leather!! Soft and yet hard That will put last multiple years.. it also includes a second bladder in your purchase. in my opinion is the best I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: El karnal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great bag but a little small, make sure you know the size you will get.
customer_reviews.author: SamFromTX

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra gingerbread
customer_reviews.text: So glad i spent the extra gingerbread. I've been ripping on it for a month. Soliiid!
customer_reviews.author: The Ginger Bread Man

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. A good speed bag. You get what you pay for and I feel this was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: crazyone

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the medium. Quite simply the best speed bag that ever used, and I have hit many. Well worth the extra $.
customer_reviews.author: Ventiphoto

customer_reviews.title: This speed bag has no equal. Soft thick leather ...
customer_reviews.text: This speed bag has no equal. Soft thick leather, fast rebound, will last a life time. All others are inferior, especially Everlast.
customer_reviews.author: Ptah

customer_reviews.title: Cleto Reyes is the best bag although my jim bradley austaralian bag is faster ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my goto end of work out bag. Cleto Reyes is the best bag although my jim bradley austaralian bag is faster and softer. all others are in second place owner of 8 high end speed bags.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Broke bladder need to get a new one
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag but the baldder poped on me an the extra one that came with is had a whole in it also for some reason but anyways i need to get a new one how would i go about that
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and the bladder used is a better quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and the bladder used is a better quality then most speed bags who use a much thinner bladder which can be susceptible to leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Smells good like fresh leather . defenetly want to add to your collection ..
customer_reviews.text: Your defenently paying for what you get the quality above avarage ...Beautifull bag ..
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo L

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one at my gym
customer_reviews.text: Real leather, easy to inflate, bladder already installed and comes with an extra bladder
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bladder valve :-(
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag. Only thing is the bladder is leaking from the valve I have only had the speedbag for less than a few months. The bag comes with a spare bladder but I dont want to have to replace it already. I wish the bladder didn't leak. Besides that the bag has great bounce and a great feel ( when it keeps air.)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Maisonet

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bag!
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than the average bag, but worth it. It has fast become my favorite bag. Quality is great - hangs straight, thick loop. They even sent it with a replacement bladder.
customer_reviews.author: barry

customer_reviews.title: Replacement needed
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to receive this bag. Unusable. Crooked as all hell. Stem and rivots are out of line. Amazon is said to replace it. See how round 2 goes. No pun
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: worth ever dime
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. it is well balanced. It has soft leather and I could use my bare hands if I wished. I use thin leather cloves. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kent

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this bag and says it's the best one he's had for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: The stitches came undone at the top
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 1 week of use and when I received it l, it didn’t seem in good condition. Maybe I just got a crap one, but usually I hear good things about them
customer_reviews.author: Nikko bolivar

customer_reviews.title: As always this product is constructed with the highest quality ...
customer_reviews.text: As always this product is constructed with the highest quality material and craftsmanship. I bought the smaller bag a couple of years ago and was very much impressed.
customer_reviews.author: MRS 1957

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought something was wrong with the bag. Then I realized this thing is fast, real fast. Makes you hit faster and more precise to get it rolling. Smells great. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Galileo

customer_reviews.title: High quality bag worth the money, true to size
customer_reviews.text: Good feel, great rebound, comes with extra bladder. Would be handy to get replacement instructions though
customer_reviews.author: Flower Power

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Colors Pictured
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Picture shows black with blue stitch lines, it came with red. That’s the sole reason for less than 5 stars. Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: xs for speed amazing bag
customer_reviews.text: Hecho En México I love it this is my third bag. Can't go wrong with this Mexican style bag.
customer_reviews.author: TheMan

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Same old fashion quality
customer_reviews.text: Came promply. Packaged with care. This is a great bag for advanced skill
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: not color scheme as shown
customer_reviews.text: product was great, except for the red stitching rather than the blue as ordered
customer_reviews.author: Sergio I Aguirre Jr

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. When they say small they mean it. Has not let me down yet. Keeps formed strong. Use the right swivel and it moves right along.
customer_reviews.author: mufnman

customer_reviews.title: has no true bounce
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid for it; does not meet the cost. Used it myself and noticed the bounce was not true. It could have been a bad one, don't know. I have three up and the two others are the cheaper mex tex. None of my boxers use the Reyes and they prefer the mex tex speed bag. The Reyes was expensive but did not work right to my standard. I have since taken it down and I put it away. Won't buy Reyes speed bags again.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Flores

customer_reviews.title: Bag is wonderful! Great quality leather
customer_reviews.text: Bag is wonderful! Great quality leather, perfect size for what I wanted and came with a replacement bladder just in case
customer_reviews.author: Grizelda Rivas

customer_reviews.title: This speed bag is the best I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This speed bag is the best I have tried. It appears and feels to be extremely well made, the shape is perfect for me (true teardrop), and Its bounce is true. I felt like I had instantly improved on the speedbag when I first used it. Worth the extra few bucks to get this fine piece of boxing equipment!
customer_reviews.author: sun2bright

customer_reviews.title: speed bag makes you feel strong
customer_reviews.text: these are the best speed bag money can buy. all Cleto Reyes products are top of the line. once it pops the replacement batters never last as long as the original.
customer_reviews.author: chris austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speed bag. Well made. Tough. Maintains inflation. No faults or flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: ... back to me but all an all was a good bag if it came red white I would of ...
customer_reviews.text: Bag was decent but not what the picture shows red and white it came all red I asked for another one maybe they messed up on there end and the same style bag came back to me but all an all was a good bag if it came red white I would of gave 4stars
customer_reviews.author: Papi ;) lol

customer_reviews.title: What craftmanship, What speed!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My god this bag is Top of the line great speed and action like no other,I have worn out bags in less then a year, the craftmanship and material is high grade, I highly recommend this product for all. GREAT PIECE OF EQUIPMENT!!!! a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Einstein

product_meta.title: Cleto Reyes Speed Bag
product_meta.description: Precise detailing provides a smooth response with each hit. Handmade in Mexico with head leather and a tough nylon lining.
feature_bullets: This is an authentic Cleto Reyes speed bag handcrafted in Mexico under strict quality control
Made of durable head leather for longevity and has a tough nylon lining to withstand even the fastest hard hitting punches
This is an excellent boxing tool for reflex and coordination to improve your offense and defense in the ring
Use the speed bag to reach your athletic and fitness goals with strength building and cardio in one
Lightweight and easy to install workout equipment for your home or commercial gym
